about_the_game:
Nikolai, broken by his past as a soldier, relives the same pain day after day. Will you be able to walk this path with him and face his struggles, or will it all end… in tragedy?

Memories of the past collide with the present, creating distorted visions, where the line between home and the battlefield grows ever thinner. You will have to make choices that lead to different endings. But what if the truth isn’t what you remember?

The game features elements of non-linearity and interactivity—nothing stops you from staring at the night street, taking a bitter drag of your cigarette...

What Awaits You:

  • A deep and emotional story

  • A strong psychological undertone

  • Retro-style visuals

  • Immersive sound design

  • And, of course, the one ray of sunshine in this wretched cage—Olechka!
detailed_description:
Warning!

This game contains scenes of violence, sudden flashes of light, unexpected sound effects, and psychologically intense moments that may cause fear, anxiety, or panic attacks.

If you have heart problems, epilepsy, or other conditions related to light sensitivity and stress, it is strongly advised to refrain from playing.

Play with caution. Your health comes first!

name: Aftershock

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: i5-6300HQ
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 560
  • DirectX: Version 11
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64-bit
  • Processor: i5-1135G7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Put yourself in the shoes of a combat veteran. Can you handle the hardships that come with a life of solitude?
supported_languages:
English, Russian*, Simplified Chinese
*languages with full audio support
